data.text:
A set of pronunciation files from the VOA news bureau. Available for listening on their website; provided by one of their US staff, and added to as new names appear in news stories. Verified with local experts, embassies, or even the family of the person in question; includes people, cities, islands, and other nouns. Copylefted with permission, after long email discussion.
